name: 陳怡倩
objective:
本課程旨在進一步提升學生的口語表達與溝通能力。透過精心設計的活動，如人工智能輔助口語練習、小組討論以及讀者劇場活動，來模擬英語對話情境，使學生有充足的機會練習聽說技巧。
This course aims to further develop students' oral expression and communication skills. Through carefully designed activities—such as AI-assisted oral practice, group discussions, and reader’s theater simulating real-life English conversation scenarios—students will have ample opportunities to practice and strengthen their listening and speaking abilities.
